thread.title: Ground News - Mount Vernon Police arrest couple on multiple drug charges
thread.title_full: Ground News - Mount Vernon Police arrest couple on multiple drug charges

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Mount Vernon Police arrest couple on multiple drug charges
text:
Summary by Ground News A Harrisburg couple was arrested in Mount Vernon on felony drug charges. Officers stopped a red truck for speeding on State Route 62 and State Street. Police say the driver produced a rolled marijuana cigarette as officers were asking about narcotics. During a search of the vehicle, police say they found five loaded needles, marijuana oil. TRISTATEHOMEPAGE Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Nexstar Media Group Mount Vernon Police arrest couple on multiple drug charges HENDERSON, Ky. (WEHT) - A Harrisburg couple was arrested in Mount Vernon on felony drug charges after authorities searched their vehicle during a traffic stop. According to a release from the Mount Vernon Police Department, officers stopped a red truck for speeding on State Route 62 and State Street just after 10 p.m. on December 27.
